sequence.reasoning: High energy opening - immediate dance celebration to match 1.0 energy and danceability
Dramatic spin turn with head lead - sets high energy tone for performance
Groovy foundation move - smooth side-to-side with roll for danceability match
Strong head nod with bounce - high energy dance move for peak danceability
Counter-spin to left with head tilt up - dynamic directional change
Circular dizzy motion - maintains high energy with complex head movement
Robotic square tracing - adds angular precision to groove
Right body turn with head roll - lateral dynamics for choreography variety
Smooth pendulum sway - foundational high-energy groove element
3-beat sway + 2-beat nod polyrhythm - complex rhythmic interest for danceability
Aggressive left spin with head down - maintains peak energy with dynamic pose
Complex three-axis spiral - showcases advanced movement capability
Continuous ear-to-shoulder roll - smooth kinetic element for groove
Right turn with tilted head up-right - adds depth and angular variation
Pendulum roll swing - hypnotic motion complements high energy groove
Extreme left spin near max limit - maximal dynamic choreography
Return to groovy sway - rhythmic anchor after dramatic spins
Extreme right spin with complex head pose - crescendo building moment
Auto-added neutral pause to fill remaining duration

notes: Full 30-second high-energy choreography with 25 distinct moves. 80% dance moves mixed with 20% dynamic manual spins (body_yaw range: -150 to +140°). No repetitions exceed 2 cycles. Maintains 1.0 energy and danceability throughout entire performance with strategic use of groovy_sway_and_roll, dizzy_spin, jackson_square, polyrhythm_combo, interwoven_spirals, and headbanger_combo at maximum amplitude.
